page.title: 10MY HOBBY
page.content: MY HOBBY IS RUNNING .I TRAIN WITH THE THIRSK AND SOWERBY HARRIERS. I GO IN CROSS COUNTRY RACES IN THE WINTER AND IN THE SUMMER I GO TO JARROW.WE TRAIN ON A THURSDAY AT 7.00PM AND ON A SUNDAY AT 10.00AM. WHEN I AM 11 YEARS OLD I WILL BE ABLE TO GO TO CLAREVILLE ON A TUESDAY.CLAREVILLE IS IN MIDDLESBOUGH.AT CLAREVILLE YOU DO FIELD EVENTS AS WELL AS TRACK.WE TRAIN AT{SOWERBY FLATTS}ON A SUNDAY AND WE TRAIN AT THIRSK SECONDARY SCHOOL TRACK.IN THE WINTER, ON A THURSDAY, WE TRAIN IN THE GYM AT THIRSK SECONDARY SCHOOL. I ENJOY GOING UP TO JARROW BEST.I LIKE DOING SPRINTS BEST OF ALL.IN THE SUMMER I DO A 7 MILE RUN AND I ENJOY DOING THAT AS WELL.YOU EVEN GET A CERTIFICATE AS A MOMENTO.
